name: Kenzo's Destiny [Discontinued]
description:
Play as Kenzo, who's Destiny is to save the world from all evil

Controls Left Mouse Click - Melee Attack Right Mouse Click - Throw Shuriken

Arrow Keys - Movement Spacebar - Jump (You can do wall jumps/jump from walls)

Abandonware Game Prototype work in progress

Thank Teh Qi Yuan for helping out in the development of this game during Ludum Dare 43.
